title: Bill Graham - A Look Back
description:
Here is a nice bootleg. Check my account for more classic bootlegs.

Please enjoy, share with friends and please seed :)

Bill Graham 
"A Look Back"
1990-1993
Graceful Duck Archive 

Cable > SuperBeta Hi-Fi > Edit SuperBeta Hi-Fi > 
Playback Sony EDV-9500 > Standalone Panasonic DMR-E50 (XP)> 
TMPGEnc DVD Author 3 
No Artwork 
NTSC / Stereo
Audio codec: AC3
Audio bitrate: 256 kb/s
Video codec: MPEG2
Picture resolution: 704x480


DVD 1

Later With Bob Costas
Broadcast dates: May 14th and 15th 1990
Chapters: 8 (at commercial breaks)
TRT: 42:45
Video bitrate: 9250 kb/s

This is a rare two part interview with Bill Graham.  
In part one, Bill shares his toughts about Jim Morrison
and The Doors, Bob Dylan, and Neil Diamond.

Part two focuses on Bill's career.  The early days in 
San Francisco, Jimi Hendrix, Otis Redding, and the 
Grateful Dead are all recalled, leaving viewers longing
to hear more. The interview ends appropriately with
discussion about Bill's involvement in philanthropic
projects from the S.N.A.C.K. benefit concert in 1975,
to his continuing work up until his death.


DVD 2

News Reports and Tributes
1991-1993
Chapters: 7
TRT: 27:51
Video bitrate: 9066 kb/s

1. CNN News Report 10-26-91
Anchor: Molly McCoy

2. KTVU (Oakland, CA) News Report 10-26-91
Anchors: Leslie Griffith, George Watson
Correspondent: Bob Hirschfeld
Comments by: Bob Barsotti

3. KGO (San Francisco, CA) News Report 10-26-91
Anchor: Carolyn Tyler
Correspondent: Michael Finney

4. KNTV (San Jose, CA) News Report 10-26-91
Anchor: Rob Fladeboe

5. BAMMIE Awards Tribute  San Francisco, CA 3-8-92
A wonderful slide show presentation covering Bill's life, 
followed by Carlos Santana introducing the newly re-named
"Bill Graham Lifetme Achievment Award".

6. CNN "Showbiz Today" 10-8-92
Anchor: Bela Shaw
Correspondent: Dennis Michael
This report covers the release of the autobiography 
"Bill Graham Presents: My life inside rock and out".  
Co-author Bob Greenfield is interviewed.

7. KGO (San Francisco, CA) News Report 1-25-93
Coverage of the Grateful Dead concert in Oakland, CA.
In addition to some nice (but quick) shots of the band
on stage, there are comments by Mickey Hart, and Huey Lewis.

8. American Music Awards 1-25-93
"Award of Merit" Presentation
Host: Gloria Estefan
Presenters:  Grace Slick, Eddie Money

A video tribute to Bill Graham, with rememberances by
Jerry Garcia, Carlos Santana, John Fogarty, Joan Baez,
and Huey Lewis is followed by a performance of 
"Find The Cost Of Freedom" by Stephen Stills.
Eddie Money then presents the "AMA Award of Merit" to
Bill's sons David and Alex, who make brief statements
